entities.name: baby dragon
entities.description: The baby dragon is described as flopping onto the table and looking unattractive.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as thinking that the baby dragon looks like a crumpled, black umbrella.

entities.name: table
entities.description: The table is where the baby dragon flopped onto.

relationships.description: Harry observes the appearance of the baby dragon.
The baby dragon is located on top of the table.
